arr.description: Web app using React Hooks, react-bootstrap, and react-icons. World clock app to view time in different timezones. Includes an animation of an analog clock.

Pokedex web app, utilizing React-Redux, redux-thunk, react-bootstrap, react-icons, and Axios. Pokedex using Poke API to fetch the information, and displaying the pokemon with pagination and filters available.

Fullstack web app utilizing React, video-react, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Cloudinary Mongoose, MongoDB, Bcrypt, and JSONwebtoken. Blog/Facebook clone utilizing authentication, video and image uploading.

Fullstack web app utilizing React-Redux, Stripe.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Axios, Node.js, Sequelize.js, PostgreSQL, AWS, Bcrypt, and JSONwebtoken. Online Store utilizing authentication and image uploading.
Front-end web app utilizing Next.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Axios, and multiple API's like Jinkan, AniAPI, Animechan, and Animenewsnetwork. Future implementation: backend using GraphQL and Postgress
